title: Did Bannon Say He’d Put Fauci’s and FBI Director Wray’s ‘Heads on Pikes’?
subtitle: The podcaster and Breitbart executive has been described as a "Trump loyalist."
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Former U.S. President Donald Trump campaign adviser Steve Bannon called for a "second term" to kick off with the firings of NIH Director Dr. Anthony Fauci and FBI Director Christopher Wray, adding that he would put their "heads on pikes" as a warning.
